1500560.name: Calico Soundtrack
1500560.description:
This is the official soundtrack for Calico, composed by John “Slide20XX” Smith! (You can find me on Twitter as @Slide20XX!)

This was a super fun soundtrack to work on - Special thanks to Emily Anderson for her wonderful singing and songwriting talents, Emi Evans for her amazing vocals, and Aivi & Surrashu for their work on one of my biggest inspirations, Steven Universe.
